rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wide open space with Scandinavian minimalistic design and natural light, serving as a transitional zone from the entrance to the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with large glass windows for ample daylight; features Scandinavian interior design elements and neutral color palette. Connects seamlessly with adjacent kitchen and dining area.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with high-end appliances, designed in a functional yet aesthetically pleasing manner adhering to Scandinavian style. Incorporates energy-efficient design principles and Vastu alignment for prosperity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, offering a space for family meals and social gatherings; features minimalist Scandinavian furniture and lighting.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A serene guest bedroom with ample natural light and storage solutions following Scandinavian design norms, oriented according to Vastu for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an en-suite bathroom; designed with a blend of Scandinavian simplicity and luxurious detailing while following Vastu principles for optimum energy distribution.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Small utility room that houses laundry and storage, ensuring a clutter-free living space in line with Scandinavian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A landscaped courtyard serving as an indoor-outdoor living space. It follows Vastu principles by allowing natural ventilation and sunlight, enhancing the overall ambiance of the ground floor.

rooms.name: Garage Area
rooms.description: Spacious two-car garage integrated with direct access from the entrance hall. Incorporates functional design elements and complies with local building norms for vehicle storage.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large glass door leading to the entrance hall; designed to maximize natural light while ensuring security.

openings.name: Frontal Windows
openings.description: Strategically placed windows enhancing ventilation and daylight penetration in key living spaces.

openings.name: Balconies
openings.description: Balconies overlooking the central courtyard providing a seamless indoor-outdoor transition.

openings.name: Roof Access Door
openings.description: Secure access door leading to the rooftop terrace; designed according to local safety codes and building norms.
